data.text: @MikeBalder Hola Mike. We'll contact the claims department and keep you posted. Sorry for the delay
@Andrea00593905 Hola Andrea, sorry for the inconvenience. Please send us a DM with your full name, email address and claim reference number https://t.co/R34zzYiXKI
@diebonilla Sorry for the inconvenience. We've sent you a new DM with instructions on how to appeal and have the case reviewed by the claims department. Please check
@Jwasson64 Hola, sorry for the inconvenience. Could you send us a DM with your full name and the PIR reference number? https://t.co/R34zzY1UII
@TabbathaWasson Hola Tabbatha, sorry for the inconvenience. Could you please send us a DM with your full name and the PIR reference number? https://t.co/R34zzY1UII
@NotTheYogaGuy Hola, please let us try to help you, could you give us the details of your complaint by DM? Thank you.
@meadcm Hola, we replied to your DM. Regards.

urls.title: Has buscado a330 or a350?utm_campaign=es.brand.org-backstage-curiosidad-a330-a350.2208 - Me gusta volar
urls.description: No se ha encontrado ningún resultado para los términos indicados. Por favor, prueba con otra búsqueda.

data.text: And now, do you know which plane this is? Learn to tell an A330 from an A350 thanks to this article 👉https://t.co/MtgGwPe1sZ (4/4) https://t.co/wgX4p7Em0W
The wing tips are aerodynamic and shaped like a triangle… (3/4)
A dark “mask” surrounds the cockpit windows… (2/4)
Can you tell an A330 from an A350? (1/4) https://t.co/TLYpuKlUR6

urls.title: Oficinas de Iberia - Iberia
urls.description: Estamos a tu disposición en nuestra amplia red de oficinas.

data.text: @tontadelculobr Hola, sentimos desde aquí no poder indicarte información adicional, ante cualquier novedad con el bulto faltante, recibirás comunicación, si no puedes contactar directamente con equipajes para que puedan brindarte detalles actualizados https://t.co/pFvjwJxVYS. Saludos

@ThinkingOThings HOla, thank you for contacting us, could you please give us by DM your case number , full passenger name and registered email to verify the information? Thanks in advance https://t.co/R34zzY1UII

@gingercsnapprod Hola, we re sorry to read this, If your flight is operated by Iberia, could you please give us by DM your booking code, ticket number and registered email to verify the information? Thanks in advance
@ianpfarrar Hola Ian, we are sorry for the inconvenience, we have escalated your case, as soon as our colleauges give us an update, we'll contact you back. Regards

@rachel_theodore Hola, sentimos leer lo ocurrido. Por favor indícanos los detalles de lo sucedido y la información del vuelo como código de reserva y número de billete comenzado por 075 para que podamos verificar la información. Quedamos atentos. https://t.co/HyIAB5NZjE

@ClaudiaKattan2 Hola Claudia. We're sorry to read this. Could you please, provide us with your PIR code and full name as registered on your booking via DM ((https://t.co/R34zzYiXKI)) so that we can review it? Regards.
@cr12356789 Hola Joan. Did you follow our advice, provided to you via DM, regarding to your case a few hours ago? Regards.

urls.title: Lanzamos una nueva tarifa, la Confort
urls.description: Dirigida a los clientes que viajan en la cabina Turista pero que quieren un plus en comodidad y en flexibilidad

data.text:
@Scara_38 Hola Scara. We're sorry to read this. In order to know further details regarding fare conditions (and everything related to its conditions in regards to changes, cancellations, and refunds), please visit: 
https://t.co/5xL3z12GdZ and https://t.co/3GgYe0bbZu. Regards.

urls.title: Booking seats - Iberia
urls.description: Book your seat on our website at the time of purchase. Or, if your fare does not include this, choose it at a cheaper rate than at the airport.

data.text: @cr12356789 Hola Joan. The information regarding seat assignment and other generalities could be found here: https://t.co/PtnK14pBsC. If you have further queries, we remain at your disposal. Regards.
@peereez96 Hola, hemos enviado respuesta a tu MD. Un saludo.

@fccbrese Hola Frank. In that case, we understand that you have been provided with a claim/case code, is that correct? If so, if you have further queries, please send us a DM with that code so that we can follow it up. Regards.

@Scara_38 2. via phone and let them know your case so that they could review it since we cannot modify or alter any booking through Social Media. If your booking was purchased with a travel agency, we suggest you to contact them. Please remember that this change may have a fee. Regards.

@Scara_38 1. Hola Scara. According to international airport rules, a passenger's name should be correctly written on both, the boarding pass and ticket. If the ticket has been purchased directly with Iberia, please reach out to our colleagues at Serviberia (https://t.co/ci7QjJOm3t)

urls.title: Check-in online - Iberia
urls.description: Reserva tu asiento, obtén tu tarjeta de embarque online y podrás ir directamente a la puerta de embarque.

data.text: @IainMsec Hola. Please copy and paste this link on your favorite web browser: https://t.co/zLqj7mnP0E. Please make sure you have deleted cookies. We suggest you do it through a private/incognito session. Regards.

urls.title: Complaints about service - Iberia
urls.description: Our Customer Service Centre includes an Iberia Complaints Service for handling customers' complaints and suggestions

data.text: @tvrtastic Hola. Our online form accepts all types of tickets, including the ones issued by BA. If an ''error'' pops up, you just need to keep clicking on ''continue'' https://t.co/qlaQPQxXaG
@ZakKilhoffer Hola Zak, we've sent you a DM with instructions on how to submit the claim through our online form. Please check

domain.name: Entities [Entity Service]
domain.description: Entity Service top level domain, every item that is in Entity Service should be in this domain

data.text: @TheCatronaut Hola, sorry for the misunderstanding and the delay in responding your DMs. We only asked you to delete the tweet where you posted the booking reference code, because this information can be used by malicious third parties. We've replied your DMs
@TheCatronaut Hola, we're sorry to read this and have just replied your DMs. Please check
@tontadelculobr Hola, hemos respondido tu mensaje directo. Saludos.

urls.title: Iberia's platform to recover your lost belongings
urls.description: Everything lost can be found. Foundspot is a free service connecting people who have lost items or pets with the people who have found it.

data.text: @alawiwsm09 Hola, unfortunately, no. You can also follow up the case by loggin into your foundspot profile at https://t.co/McKyXP7Yxx . If there's a match, you will receive an email with further details. Best regards
@SVmom1 Hola, sorry for the delay. We'll contact the claims department and keep you posted. Best regards

domain.name: Entities [Entity Service]
domain.description: Entity Service top level domain, every item that is in Entity Service should be in this domain

data.text: @AbundanceBound We've replied your other tweet. Please check and deleted the tweets where you wrote the PIR reference number. We kindly ask you to avoid posting this kind of info on public chats
@sarahlaclau We're deeply sorry, Sarah. Unfortunately, we're still waiting for an update from the claims department. Apologies

domain.name: Entities [Entity Service]
domain.description: Entity Service top level domain, every item that is in Entity Service should be in this domain

data.text: @AbundanceBound Hola, sorry for the inconvenience. Please delete the tweet where you wrote the PIR reference number and send us the PIR and your full name via DM https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa
@diebonilla Please send us a DM with your email address and claim reference number https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa
@leslyann37 Thanks. We've received the boarding pass. Please check our question via DM

@leslyann37 The flight selected when submitting the complaint was the one on june 19. So we kindly ask you to send us the boarding pass via DM once again and provide the number of the seat you ended up with. This way we can ask our colleagues to review your case https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa

@leslyann37 We've located a boarding pass for a flight (IB3866) in june 9, but your claim is actually related to a flight that took place in june 19. That's why we are asking for the boarding pass. Could you please provide the boarding pass for the IB3865 in june 19? https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa
@leslyann37 Could you please send us a new DM with the boarding pass and clarify in which seat you ended up flying? We'll ask our colleagues to review your case once again https://t.co/HyIAB5Nru6
@sam_powell14 Thank you.

@EPhillipsMA You should have opened the PIR at the airport with the airline that operated the last flight in your itinerary. If it was us, then please contact the baggage center over the phone. Here you find the numbers listed by country https://t.co/xXBAaaJ8JG
@SohailS45484370 Hola Sohail, Send us a DM with as much info as possible, please remember to include your reference number and full contact details to try to help you from here. Thank you.
@cr12356789 Hello Joan, if you wish to appeal to the decision, please use our online form to argue the resolution. Thank you.
@itsrealleigh Hola Benjamin, we replied to your DM. Regards.
@Yeliz30170546 Hola Yel, unfortunately we can´t give you a different answer from here, you can appeal to the reply using our complaint form. Kind regards.
@Yeliz30170546 Hola Yel, we sent you an email the 19/08/2022, could you check your email folders please? Thank you.
@clangchico Hola Clangton, our colleagues will contact you as soon as they have a match. Thank you.
@MacroverseAdam Sure Adam! We'll do everything possible to help. Please let us know if your daughter contact us so we can locate her message as soon as possible.

@MacroverseAdam Hola Adam, if you are not the claim holder we wouldn't be able to assist you directly. Please let your daughter know that she can reach out to us and we'll be glad to assist her. Kind regards.

@sam_powell14 Hola Sam, we're very sorry to read this. Please send us a DM with the details of your booking and the change that you want for your return flight so we can have a look and assist you. Kind regards. https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa
@SoniaBenages Hola Sonia. Te hemos solicitado más detalles de la situación que comentas por DM. Quedamos muy atentos. Un saludo.

@unLex Hola Lex, we're sorry to read this. Please send us a DM with the details of your PIR and the incident that ocurred with your bag so we can have a look and assist you. Kind regards. https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa
@EPhillipsMA Hola Eli, if you currently have an open PIR, you will be able to check the status of your bag here in our website https://t.co/uE1w4kTKL4 . Kind regards.
@allabouttiffany Hola Tiffany, please send us a DM with the details of your booking so we can have a look and assist you. Kind regards. https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa

@SoniaBenages Hola Sonia. Sentimos leer lo que comentas. ¿Podrías por favor, enviarnos un DM, con los datos de tu reserva y nombre completo para poder informar al área correspondiente? Quedamos atentos. Saludos.

@ScandiMumOfFour Hola Kir, unfortunately we haven't received news on your case, but we have requested the corresponding department again, as soon as we have more info on your case we will let you know. Apologies for the inconveniences, best regards.

@diebonilla Hola Meno, we wouldn't be able to tell you the status of your claim if you issued it with an external institution, however, there are some situations that don't allow for compensations to be handed, did you issue a claim directly with us before? Let us know. Kind regards.

data.text:
@nina18karlin Hola Nina. We are sorry to read about this, however it will be necessary for your friend to contact us directly. He/She can do it via Facebook or Twitter. Our data protection policy requires that we treat inquiries only with the owners. We appreciate your understanding.
Regards,

@fccbrese Hola Frank. To confirm, did our customer service team provide you a resolution to your claim? Please let us know. 
Kind regards,

@SoniaBenages Hola Sonia, desconocemos los detalles del incidente. Déjanos saber por MD si hay algo en lo que podamos asistirte desde este departamento. Saludos.
https://t.co/HyIAB5Nru6

@sophii_gp Hola Sophi, sentimos leer tus comentarios. Déjanos saber por MD si hay algo en lo que podamos ayudarte desde este departamento. Saludos.
https://t.co/HyIAB5Nru6
@freed_adam Hola Adam, sorry for the inconvenience. Please send us a DM with your email address and claim reference number https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa

urls.title: IBERIA.COM en United States - the best prices for Iberia flights
urls.description: Check the offers of cheap flights from the United States to more than 300 Iberia destinations in Spain, Europe, America and Asia, and reserve it at the best price

data.text: @traxoid We've made a new simulation and the flights show up, as you can see on the screenshot. So please try with a different device: https://t.co/m6fyDz8alC https://t.co/flSJgtFdxx

@natleyva2 Hola Nat, sentimos que tengas esta impresión de nosotros. Si tienes alguna consulta pendiente con nosotros nos gustaria que nos lo indicaras por DM para saber de que manera podriamos asistirte, saludos. https://t.co/HyIAB5Nru6

urls.title: IBERIA.COM en United States - the best prices for Iberia flights
urls.description: Check the offers of cheap flights from the United States to more than 300 Iberia destinations in Spain, Europe, America and Asia, and reserve it at the best price

data.text: @traxoid Hola, we've just made a test and we were able to find flights from Madrid to Porto on august 28. Please clear the browser's memory cache or try again with a different browser or device. Also, make sure that you aren't checking the box ''pay with Avios'': https://t.co/m6fyDz8alC

@TheCatronaut Hola, we're sorry to read this. The email was sent to you on august 21st and we've just replied your DMs. Also, notice that the email offers a voucher (reembolso mediante bono) or a flight change, not a refund. Please check our DM

@raul61548914 Hola Raúl, no podriamos indicarte nada distinto desde redes pues esta seria la única opción indicada por el centro de equipajes para proceder con tu caso en relación a tu equipaje. Es importante consultar directamente con las autoridades del aeropuerto correspondiente, saludos.
@gquinnx We've just replied it. Please check
@gquinnx Hola, please send us your booking code and contact details by DM. Thank you.

@sarahlaclau Hola Sarah, sorry for the inconvenience. The claim was received, but it still hasn't been processed. We'll get back to you via DM as soon as we have an update from the relevant department
@gquinnx Hola, we depend of the airport control, we appreciate your patience.

@TexasGI47tweets Hola, los requisitos de entrada son establecidos por el país de destino, no por la compañía, en este caso como tu situación no se contempla en la información que disponemos, consulta directamente con la embajada, Gracias
@Dvdb1998 Thank you.
@TexasGI47tweets Hola, en este caso te recomendamos consultar directamente con la embajada para que pueda aclararte. Un saludo
@Dvdb1998 Hola Dennis, could you send us your booking code and last name,by DM? Thank you.

urls.title: Restricciones para viajar por COVID-19
urls.description: Comprueba la normativa, requerimientos y restricciones para viajar que establecen los países. Planifica tu vuelo asegurándote que cumples con todos los requisitos para hacer tu viaje internacional.

data.text: @TexasGI47tweets Hola, en este enlace puedes revisar las condiciones de entrada exigidas https://t.co/J4NrDAA0xS. Saludos
@cheunghk5 Hola, we replied to it. Regards.
@Marianto_Gaya Hola Marianto, we replied to your DM, we will follow your case there. Thank you.
@simba_040 Hola Michael, we are sorry to read this, we have replied your DM. Regards

urls.title: Iberia's platform to recover your lost belongings
urls.description: Everything lost can be found. Foundspot is a free service connecting people who have lost items or pets with the people who have found it.

data.text: @alawiwsm09 Hola Ali, unfortunately, there isn't any update on the foundspot website, as you can see at https://t.co/McKyXP7Yxx . If there's a match, you will receive an email with further details. Regards
@DanGlezReyes Hola Danny, please send us a DM with your booking code, full name and ticket number. Regards
@TheCatronaut Hola, you can give us more details by DM of the response you received by email so we can review it. Regards
@MrsT8410 Hola Claire, we replied to your DM. Regards.
@nudlsuppn Hola, we replied to your DM. Regards.
@aon_sceal Hola Derek, please send us a DM with the open file code to review. Regards
@TheCatronaut Hola. We are sorry for the incident presented, we understand that the positive COVID test certificate is necessary, detailing that it is not possible to fly. Kind Regards
@goalajnr Hola Gary, we understand that you have an open claim, can you please send a DM us the file number to review? Let us know. Regards

@TheCatronaut Hola Alf. We remind you that the current measures and regulations do not depend on the airline, these are managed directly on the health and government authorities of each country.
Regards,

@MrsT8410 Hola Claire.  Have you opened an irregularity (PIR) at the airport? Could you please provide us  the details via direct message  https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa so we'd be able to consult from here? We remain at your disposal. 
Kind Regards
@slalani Hola Sohail, we sent you a DM requesting some information. Thank you.

@Marianto_Gaya Hola Marianto. We have answered your direct message, as we mention there, we are unable to provide you a different answer as before, our colleagues have reviewed your request and the refund was issued correctly on the dates mentioned. Regards,
@Marianto_Gaya Hola Marianto. We have answered your direct message, as we mention there, we will consult internally. We appreciate your patience. Regards,
@tvrtastic colleagues would communicate directly with you, because the search would continue. We remain at your disposal, regards. /2
@tvrtastic Hola Robert, in this case you should be able to carry out the corresponding claim for compensation for your luggage. We inform you that in any way if there were news about it our /1

@cryptapa Hola, we are sorry that you have this impression of us, if you have any pending queries with us we would like you to indicate it to us by DM to give you a better answer. Regards. https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa
@bronxasaur Hola Braxton, we do not know the details of your case. If you wish you can leave us a description by DM to verify how we could assist you, regards. https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa
@jackwards483 Hola JE, did you purchase your gift card with us? Please send us a DM with the details so we can have a look. Kind regards. https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa
@RuthJackson7 Please contact your nearest Iberia Baggage Services Centre through our website https://t.co/ci7QjJOm3t or directly at this line: +34900111342. Kind regards.
@countduckula84 Hola Chris, we have replied to your DMs. Kind regards.
